description: This file defines a data model for movie scripts using Pydantic, sets up an agent with a MistralChat model and DuckDuckGoTools, and runs the agent to generate a movie script based on the input 'New York'.

classes.name: MovieScript
classes.description: A Pydantic model representing the structure of a movie script, including setting, ending, genre, name, characters, and storyline.

methods.name: run
methods.description: Method of the Agent class used to generate a response based on input prompt.
